name: Galil-3-0
tagline: ASYN based EPICS driver for Galil products
body:
### Welcome

This driver has the following features:  
A) Asyn model 3 architecture  
B) Motor record support  
C) Example MEDM screens  
D) Analog and Digital IO  
E) Output compare for servo motors  
F) Time based profile motion (Trajectories)  
G) Coordinate system axes (eg. Slit width)  
H) Sophisticated communication management  
I) Fast update rates  

The driver is for linux runlevel 5, or windows  

I hope it is useful :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
